item.title: Four workers dead in Cuba bridge collapse -Canada miner Sherritt
item.description: [Reuters] - Canadian miner Sherritt International Corp said on Wednesday that four workers from its Moa joint venture in Cuba had died when a municipal bridge they were repairing collapsed Tuesday afternoon. Sherritt, ...
